12 class TestIMU(unittest.TestCase):
13  n_imu = 7
14  received_messages = [False] * n_imu
15 
16  def test_published(self):
17  # create subscribers for num_imus topics
18  for i in range(self.n_imu):
19  rospy.Subscriber('imu_data{}'.format(i), Imu, self.imu_callback)
20 
21  rospy.sleep(2)
22 
23  count = 0
24  while not rospy.is_shutdown() and count < 10:
25  count += 1
26 
27  for i_imu in range(self.n_imu):
28  self.assertTrue(self.received_messages[i_imu])
29 
30  def imu_callback(self, msg):
31  i_imu = int(msg.header.frame_id[-1])
32  self.received_messages[i_imu] = True
33 
34 
35 if __name__ == '__main__':
36  import rostest
37  rospy.init_node('test_imu')
38  rostest.rosrun('ros_robotic_skin', 'test_imu', TestIMU)
